title: 匠魂ID
author: hzdl
txt_content:
我要添加连锁挖矿
就算所有稿子ID都一样我也要
ID哦

replies.txt_content:
\.minecraft\config\veinminer--general.cfg
只替换最下面两行的
overrides {
    # Mine all blocks with all registered tools that can harvest blocks.
    B:override.allBlocks=true

    # Allow all tools, including the open hand, to be used to mine blocks.
    B:override.allTools=true
}

更改连锁配置文件
替换连锁的配置文件
\.minecraft\config\veinminer
只替换最下面两行的
overrides {
    # Mine all blocks with all registered tools that can harvest blocks.
    B:override.allBlocks=true

    # Allow all tools, including the open hand, to be used to mine blocks.
    B:override.allTools=true
}
